question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.
In your letter:
give contact details for when you are away
give instructions on how to take care of your pet
describe the other household duties
text: Hello, How are you? Hope you are doing well.  Thanks for agreeing to be my “houe-sitter” and Rocky’s doggy-sitter while I am away to Singapore. I fly out on July 2 and get back on July 12.

I will be staying at  Hotel Vista, Cambridge Road, Singapore. You already have my mobile number so if you need to contact me you can call or message me on  Whatsapp or IMO. If I  take new number, I will let you know immediately.

I wrote down Rocky’s diet and kept the note on the table. You have to give him food three times a day.. he needs a walk morning and evening. He is used to you and will give you no trouble.  My maid comes twice a day for cleaning the house. You can give her time according to your schedule. Please remember to turn off the  garden lights at night. The fridge is stocked up and it’s all yours. If you feel like cooking you can take help of maid.
